description: Raijinshuu was created by Laxus as his "bodyguards". They worked for Laxus and they are lead by Fried who is the self-proclaimed captain (and is later made a candidate for becoming an S-rank mage). They were originally loners who didn`t socialize or think much about their fellow guild members, but following Laxus`s excommunication they started to open up more.
name: Raijinshuu
